title: Bug 371684type construction for signature makes mistakes with wildcards
description: If you have a type with multiple type params, like this:Foo<?,The signature is:LFoo<TT;;and the handling of  is not working in TypeFactory.If that signature is passed in it will actually build:Foo<?having lost the second type parameter, this breaks code later that has expectations on the number of params.(e.g. ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException when building parameterization map)
